articles.author: Ellen Knickmeyer, Maria Verza
articles.title: Trump administration labels 8 Latin American cartels as ‘foreign terrorist organizations’ - The Associated Press
articles.description: The Trump administration has designated eight Latin American crime organizations as “foreign terrorist organizations,” upping its pressure on cartels operating in the U.S. and on anyone aiding them. The move carries out a Jan. 20 executive order by President …
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) The Trump administration is formally designating eight Latin American crime organizations as foreign terrorist organizations, upping its pressure on cartels operating in the U.S. and … [+3661 chars]
